titleStmt.title: The ancient state, authoritie, and proceedings of the Court of Requests 2 Octob. 1596.
titleStmt.author: Caesar, Julius, Sir, 1558-1636.
(England and Wales. Court of Requests)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the deputies of C. Barker],

notesStmt.note: The text proper begins with new register on p. 1; caption title: "In nomine Domini nostri Iesu Christi. 13. Februarij. 1592. Actes, orders, and decrees made by the King and his Counsell, 9. H.7. ..". This section is sometimes found separately from the preliminaries.
The last leaf is blank. An errata leaf is inserted preceding this, possibly only in later copies.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 193 (main text only) and at reel 198 (same copy filmed twice).
